sentence.Network_en: They trekked for three days along the banks of the Zambezi.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们沿着赞比西河河岸跋涉了三天.

sentence.Network_en: Along with hippos and bathing elephants, crocodiles share the Zambezi River.
sentence.Network_cn: 除了河马和洗浴的大象, 鳄鱼也是赞比西河的享有者之一.

sentence.Network_en: Zambezi River Basin Project ( Zambezi Project )
sentence.Network_cn: 赞比西河流域项目 ( 赞比西河项目 )

means.word_mean: 1. an African river; flows into the Indian Ocean

auth_sentence.content: The Zambezi basin in Southern Africa will be used as a case study.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Zambezi basin in Southern Africa will be used as a case study.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Zambezi basin in Southern Africa will be used as a case study.

auth_sentence.content: Several African basins show significant drying over the study period - locations such as the Congo, Zambezi and the Nile.
auth_sentence.res_content: Several African basins show significant drying over the study period - locations such as the Congo, Zambezi and the Nile.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Several African basins show significant drying over the study period - locations such as the Congo, Zambezi and the Nile.
